channel.title: attack.t1202 on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in attack.t1202 on My New Hugo Site

item.title: False Sysinternals Suite Tools
item.description: Rename as a legitim Sysinternals Suite tools to evade detection

item.title: Suspicious Subsystem for Linux Bash Execution
item.description: Performs execution of specified file, can be used as a defensive evasion.

item.title: Suspicious Splwow64 Without Params
item.description: Detects suspicious Splwow64.exe process without any command line parameters

item.title: Conhost Parent Process Executions
item.description: Detects the conhost execution as parent process. Can be used to evaded defense mechanism.

item.title: Renamed ZOHO Dctask64
item.description: Detects a renamed dctask64.exe used for process injection, command execution, process creation with a signed binary by ZOHO Corporation

item.title: Indirect Command Execution
item.description: Detect indirect command execution via Program Compatibility Assistant (pcalua.exe or forfiles.exe).

item.title: Application Whitelisting Bypass via Bginfo
item.description: Execute VBscript code that is referenced within the *.bgi file.

item.title: Findstr Launching .lnk File
item.description: Detects usage of findstr to identify and execute a lnk file as seen within the HHS redirect attack

item.title: Renamed PAExec
item.description: Detects suspicious renamed PAExec execution as often used by attackers

item.title: Suspicious Execution from Outlook
item.description: Detects EnableUnsafeClientMailRules used for Script Execution from Outlook

item.title: Suspicious ftp.exe
item.description: Detects renamed ftp.exe, ftp.exe script execution and child processes ran by ftp.exe

item.title: Suspicious Rundll32 Without Any CommandLine Params
item.description: Detects suspicious start of rundll32.exe without any parameters as found in CobaltStrike beacon activity

item.title: Suspicious Runscripthelper.exe
item.description: Detects execution of powershell scripts via Runscripthelper.exe

item.title: Suspicious Service Binary Directory
item.description: Detects a service binary running in a suspicious directory

item.title: Suspicious ZipExec Execution
item.description: ZipExec is a Proof-of-Concept (POC) tool to wrap binary-based tools into a password-protected zip file.

item.title: Winword.exe Loads Suspicious DLL
item.description: Detects Winword.exe loading of custmom dll via /l cmd switch

item.title: WSL Execution
item.description: Detects Possible usage of Windows Subsystem for Linux (WSL) binary as a LOLBIN
